song_analysis.title: Echoes of the City
song_analysis.lyrical_themes: Loneliness, urban life, introspection (assuming based on genre)
song_analysis.instrumentation: Lo-fi drums, piano, synth pads, subtle bass
song_analysis.character_description: A young woman with dark, shoulder-length hair, wearing an oversized hoodie and jeans, appears lost in thought.

scenes.scene_setting: Rainy city street at night, neon lights reflecting on wet pavement.
scenes.video_prompt: A young woman walks slowly down a rainy city street at night. Neon signs cast colorful reflections on the wet pavement. She looks down, lost in thought. The camera focuses on her face, then pans up to show the cityscape blurred by the rain. Slow motion used for emphasis.
scenes.image_prompt: Cinematic still of a woman walking on a rainy city street at night, neon lights reflecting. Focus on her contemplative face, rain blurring the background. Cinematic style, dramatic lighting, shallow depth of field.
scenes.scene_description: The video opens with a shot of a lone figure walking through a rainy city street. The woman is lost in thought, and the rain seems to mirror her melancholic mood.
scenes.action: Walking slowly and reflectively through the rain.

scenes.scene_setting: Inside a dimly lit, smoky cafe with large windows overlooking the city.
scenes.video_prompt: The woman sits alone at a table in a dimly lit cafe. She sips coffee and gazes out the window at the city lights. The cafe is filled with soft ambient light and a haze of smoke. Close-up on her eyes, reflecting the city lights.
scenes.image_prompt: Cinematic image of a woman sitting alone in a smoky cafe, looking out the window at the city lights. Soft, diffused lighting, shallow depth of field, focus on her eyes. Strong contrast between interior darkness and the bright city lights. Cinematic style.
scenes.scene_description: Moving inside, the character finds herself in a quiet cafe. She looks out at the city lights, suggesting a sense of longing and disconnection.
scenes.action: Sitting, sipping coffee, and gazing out the window.

scenes.scene_setting: Rooftop overlooking the city at dawn, mist hanging in the air.
scenes.video_prompt: The woman stands on a rooftop overlooking the city as dawn breaks. Mist hangs in the air. She closes her eyes and takes a deep breath. The camera pans out to show the vast cityscape awakening as the sun rises.
scenes.image_prompt: Cinematic still of a woman standing on a rooftop at dawn overlooking a misty city. Soft, ethereal light, pastel colors in the sky. Wide shot emphasizing the cityscape. Cinematic style, focus on atmosphere and scale.
scenes.scene_description: As the sun begins to rise, the woman goes to a rooftop and looks out over the city. There she finds a small peace and calmnes.
scenes.action: Standing still, breathing deeply, watching the sunrise.
